title: Premium AMD gaming PC guide: Best parts for a high-end AMD build
content:
Finding the best parts for a gaming PC build is not an easy task, especially now as we find ourselves amidst a global chip shortage. That being said, there are ways to navigate around this crisis and find parts for a PC build. If not, you can always use our PC build guides to configure

The post Premium AMD gaming PC guide: Best parts for a high-end AMD build appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this PC build guide, we're going to take a look at some of the best PC parts you can buy to put-together a high-end AMD gaming PC.
